projects: [{"title":"LetmeListen ","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"Developed a RNN model which renders if there are more than 1 speakers in a given audio fileand separates the primary speaker from the secondary ones with a good accuracy. The output of the model provesout to be extremely useful in devices that deal with speech recognition. Used techniques include a combination ofRNNs, LSTM and GRU."},{},{"title":"BasicsOnMe","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Developed an app on Google Actions Console which was solely meant to help ease the burden of gloomy days ongoing due to Covid-19 pandemic. The app saw a means of entertainment plus game with the involvement of a personality development quiz. Used spreadsheets and Actions Console to create it for those who use Google assistant regularly!"},{"title":"NeStEr","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Developed a CNN model for school students to design their own art work of loitering around with 2 different pictures and combining them to generate a single master piece. Used VGG Network, NST and tensorflow to build it."},{"title":"DiceOThrow","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"May 2020","description":"Implemented a simple game so as to prevent anyone doing biased tricks on the dice in the games played with it!! Or better can be used to play dice games without a dice!. Tools used include HTML, CSS and JavaScript."},{"title":"DataReg","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Jan 2020","description":"Implemented a project that was based onto helping people to identify the best amongst the used cars in the city and aid them in choosing one as per their expectations and needs. In this the data set of 6085 used cars was regressed and a regression model was created so as to rate the best cars amongst all."},{"title":"BillApp","start_date":"Nov 2019","end_date":"Nov 2019","description":"An app to cater the needs of the less counters in big marts in cheap ways. The app sees the working of a bar code scanner and is built using Android Studio."}]

honors_and_awards.title: Women in Tech, Regatta 2020 Scholar
honors_and_awards.description: Recipient of the Women in Tech(WiT), Regatta Scholarship so as to attend the Tech & Career fair organised by WiT Regatta Founder & Producer - Melody Biringer.

honors_and_awards.title: Winner in Electrochemistry and Corrosion Camp
honors_and_awards.description: Bagged first position in the technical presentation on Electrochemistry during the three day technical camp conducted in Chennai by the National Association of Corrosion Engineers in association with BARC.
